THE MESSAGE OF THE COIN IS PRETTY STRAIGHT FORWARD ANYTHING OTHER THAN BITCOIN IS A SHIT COIN AND THEY ALL END UP DEAD, AND IN THE GUTTER EVENTUALLY "ALL YOUR SHIT COINS FLOAT DOWN HERE" 13 COINS MADE IN TOTALMY PHONE CAMERA IS NOT THE BEST HERE IS A VIDEO LINK COIN VIDEOhttps://imgur.com/PMkcCqRSOME TUNES: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y1O4o2LVNOcLOT 1LOT 2STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0025 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002 BTCEND TIME: OCTBOBER 20th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**PAYMENT DUE 24 HOURS AFTER AUCTION ENDS**PAYMENT ADDRESS: 3Q6xqVmawb3B176vvzkZUdUgxDyst9Z1yZSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.SHIPPING: $10 USD IF YOUR IN THE USA! IF OUTSIDE THE USA I WILL SHIP TO MINERJONES AND HE CAN RESHIP TO YOUR COUNTRY FEES WILL VARY DEPENDING ON LOCATION

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Also just realized the MybITs in the back......IT ..Classic....that was some book...I think the scariest I ever read to be honest.  What a great tribute for Mr King and also for Halloween Bitcoin!

comments.author: MrMojoRising26
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on October 17, 2023, 09:39:04 PM Also just realized the MybITs in the back......IT ..Classic....that was some book...I think the scariest I ever read to be honest.  What a great tribute for Mr King and also for Halloween Bitcoin!glad you caught that one! I enjoyed the book as well I grew up watching all the King films.As far as the shitcoin/shit coin thing if thats what we are debating about I can live with that haha I know the term as one word as well, but on phones, computers, or even on the forum it shows as a spelling mistake when you type it as one word. I will say that one word just works better I should have left out the space, but I did not pay much attention to it at the time I just seen a misspelling and corrected it
